mil7.2.3:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.2.3:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.2.3:1.1_0: “Anyone who sees what you clearly described?”
mil7.2.3:1.2_0: “Great king, the simile of the strips of vegetables from me, but they didn’t clean it by with a large mass of water.
mil7.2.3:1.3_0: In the same way, a village chief, someone who lives the neck of territory, the domain of your mindfulness meditation, disheved heaps it from all over, but large amounted to the ball of mindfulness meditation.
mil7.2.3:1.4_0: This is quite different throat, great king,
mil7.2.3:1.5_0: When I have spoken, great king, this is Cūḷapanthaka
mil7.2.3:2.4_0: they should be executed again and again.’”
mil7.2.3:3.1_0: as a third with sunn hemp.
